Text:

I'm looking for a 1080p encode also.

Things are going backwards, as someone recently posted on 3/1/13 some 3GB 4000 Kbps encodes. May as well just re-encode it down to 30x16 "watch" size and get it over with. It's amazing the crap-quality people get used to these days.
